verses.verse: וְשָׁ֨ם <WH8033> to be there נִקְרָ֜א <WH7122> And there happened אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> to be there a man בְּלִיַּ֗עַל <WH1100> of Belial וּשְׁמ֛וֹ <WH8034> whose name שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7652> [was] Sheba בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בִּכְרִ֖י <WH1075> of Bichri אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every יְמִינִ֑י <WH3228> Jaminites וַיִּתְקַ֣ע <WH8628> and he blew בַּשֹּׁפָ֗ר <WH7782> a trumpet וַ֠יֹּאמֶר <WH559> and said אֵֽין־ <WH369> have לָ֨נוּ חֵ֜לֶק <WH2506> We have no part בְּדָוִ֗ד <WH1732> in David וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> Nor נַֽחֲלָה־ <WH5159> neither have we inheritance לָ֙נוּ֙ בְּבֶן־ <WH1121> in the son יִשַׁ֔י <WH3448> of Jesse אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> man לְאֹהָלָ֖יו <WH168> to his tents יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> O Israel

וַיַּ֜עַל <WH5927> went up כָּל־ <WH3605> all אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> So every man יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel מֵאַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> from after דָוִ֔ד <WH1732> David אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> [and] followed שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7652> Sheba בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בִּכְרִ֑י <WH1075> of Bichri וְאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> but the men יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah דָּבְק֣וּ <WH1692> clave בְמַלְכָּ֔ם <WH4428> unto their king מִן־ <WH4480> from הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <WH3383> from Jordan וְעַד־ <WH5704> even יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> even to Jerusalem

וַיָּבֹ֨א <WH935> came דָוִ֣ד <WH1732> And David אֶל־ <WH413> to his בֵּיתוֹ֮ <WH1004> to his house יְרֽוּשָׁלִַם֒ <WH3389> at Jerusalem וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> took הַמֶּ֡לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king אֵ֣ת <WH853> עֶֽשֶׂר־ <WH6235> the ten נָשִׁ֣ים ׀ <WH802> women פִּלַגְשִׁ֡ים <WH6370> [his] concubines אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom הִנִּיחַ֩ <WH3240> whom he had left לִשְׁמֹ֨ר <WH8104> to keep הַבַּ֜יִת <WH1004> the house וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֤ם <WH5414> and put בֵּית־ <WH1004> to his house מִשְׁמֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH4931> them in ward וַֽיְכַלְכְּלֵ֔ם <WH3557> and fed וַאֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> about לֹא־ <WH3808> did not בָ֑א <WH935> them but went not in וַתִּהְיֶ֧ינָה <WH1961> become צְרֻר֛וֹת <WH6887> unto them So they were shut up עַד־ <WH5704> until י֥וֹם <WH3117> unto the day מֻתָ֖ן <WH4194> dead אַלְמְנ֥וּת <WH491> in widowhood חַיּֽוּת׃ <WH2424> living ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> Then said הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> the king אֶל־ <WH413> to עֲמָשָׂ֔א <WH6021> to Amasa הַזְעֶק־ <WH2199> Assemble לִ֥י אֶת־ <WH853> אִישׁ־ <WH376> me the men יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> within three יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> days וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> yourself פֹּ֥ה <WH6311> here עֲמֹֽד׃ <WH5975> and be thou here present

וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> went עֲמָשָׂ֖א <WH6021> So Amasa לְהַזְעִ֣יק <WH2199> to assemble אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> [the men of] Judah [וַיִּיחֶר כ] (וַיֹּ֕וחֶר <WH309> continue ק) מִן־ <WH4480> than הַמּוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> than the set time אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יְעָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3259> which he had appointed ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> And David אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲבִישַׁ֔י <WH52> to Abishai עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now יֵ֧רַֽע <WH3415> do us more harm לָ֛נוּ שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7652> Now shall Sheba בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בִּכְרִ֖י <WH1075> of Bichri מִן־ <WH4480> more אַבְשָׁל֑וֹם <WH53> than [did] Absalom אַ֠תָּה <WH859> you קַ֞ח <WH3947> take אֶת־ <WH853> עַבְדֵ֤י <WH5650> servants אֲדֹנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH113> thou thy lord's וּרְדֹ֣ף <WH7291> and pursue אַחֲרָ֔יו <WH310> after פֶּן־ <WH6435> so מָ֥צָא <WH4672> him lest he get ל֛וֹ עָרִ֥ים <WH5892> cities בְּצֻר֖וֹת <WH1219> him fenced וְהִצִּ֥יל <WH5337> and escape עֵינֵֽנוּ׃ <WH5869> us

וַיֵּצְא֤וּ <WH3318> And there went out אַֽחֲרָיו֙ <WH310> after אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> men יוֹאָ֔ב <WH3097> him Joab's וְהַכְּרֵתִ֥י <WH3774> and the Cherethites וְהַפְּלֵתִ֖י <WH6432> and the Pelethites וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַגִּבֹּרִ֑ים <WH1368> and all the mighty men וַיֵּֽצְאוּ֙ <WH3318> and they went out מִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem לִרְדֹּ֕ף <WH7291> to pursue אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> after שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7652> Sheba בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בִּכְרִֽי׃ <WH1075> of Bichri

הֵ֗ם <WH1992> like עִם־ <WH5973> with הָאֶ֤בֶן <WH68> stone הַגְּדוֹלָה֙ <WH1419> When they [were] at the great אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בְּגִבְע֔וֹן <WH1391> which [is] in Gibeon וַעֲמָשָׂ֖א <WH6021> Amasa בָּ֣א <WH935> went לִפְנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> before וְיוֹאָ֞ב <WH3097> them And Joab's חָג֣וּר ׀ <WH2296> was girded מִדּ֣וֹ <WH4055> garment לְבֻשׁ֗וּ <WH3830> that he had put on [וְעָלֹו כ] (וְעָלָ֞יו <WH5921> and over ק) חֲג֥וֹר <WH2290> A belt חֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> [with] a sword מְצֻמֶּ֤דֶת <WH6775> fastened עַל־ <WH5921> and over מָתְנָיו֙ <WH4975> upon his loins בְּתַעְרָ֔הּ <WH8593> in the sheath וְה֥וּא <WH1931> he יָצָ֖א <WH3318> thereof and as he went forth וַתִּפֹּֽל׃ <WH5307> it fell out ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יוֹאָב֙ <WH3097> And Joab לַעֲמָשָׂ֔א <WH6021> to Amasa הֲשָׁל֥וֹם <WH7965> [Art] thou in health אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you אָחִ֑י <WH251> another וַתֹּ֜חֶז <WH270> took יַד־ <WH3027> hand יְמִ֥ין <WH3225> with the right יוֹאָ֛ב <WH3097> Joab בִּזְקַ֥ן <WH2206> by the beard עֲמָשָׂ֖א <WH6021> Amasa לִנְשָׁק־ <WH5401> to kiss לֽוֹ׃

וַעֲמָשָׂ֨א <WH6021> But Amasa לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not נִשְׁמַ֜ר <WH8104> took no heed בַּחֶ֣רֶב ׀ <WH2719> to the sword אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בְּיַד־ <WH3027> hand יוֹאָ֗ב <WH3097> that [was] in Joab's וַיַּכֵּהוּ֩ <WH5221> so he smote בָ֨הּ אֶל־ <WH413> in הַחֹ֜מֶשׁ <WH2570> him therewith in the fifth וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֨ךְ <WH8210> [rib] and shed out מֵעָ֥יו <WH4578> his bowels אַ֛רְצָה <WH776> to the ground וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and did not him שָׁ֥נָה <WH8138> and struck him not again ל֖וֹ וַיָּמֹ֑ת <WH4191> and he died ס וְיוֹאָב֙ <WH3097> So Joab וַאֲבִישַׁ֣י <WH52> and Abishai אָחִ֔יו <WH251> his brother רָדַ֕ף <WH7291> pursued אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> after שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7652> Sheba בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בִּכְרִֽי׃ <WH1075> of Bichri

וְאִישׁ֙ <WH376> And one עָמַ֣ד <WH5976> be at a stand עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> and מִֽנַּעֲרֵ֖י <WH5288> men יוֹאָ֑ב <WH3097> of Joab's וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> by him and said מִי֩ <WH4310> He אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after חָפֵ֧ץ <WH2654> that favoureth בְּיוֹאָ֛ב <WH3097> Joab וּמִ֥י <WH4310> any אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after לְדָוִ֖ד <WH1732> and he that [is] for David אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> [let him go] after יוֹאָֽב׃ <WH3097> Joab

וַעֲמָשָׂ֛א <WH6021> And Amasa מִתְגֹּלֵ֥ל <WH1556> wallowed בַּדָּ֖ם <WH1818> in blood בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst הַֽמְּסִלָּ֑ה <WH4546> of the highway וַיַּ֨רְא <WH7200> saw הָאִ֜ישׁ <WH376> And when the man כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עָמַ֣ד <WH5975> stood still כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> that all the people וַיַּסֵּב֩ <WH5437> he removed אֶת־ <WH853> עֲמָשָׂ֨א <WH6021> Amasa מִן־ <WH4480> from הַֽמְסִלָּ֤ה <WH4546> out of the highway הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> into the field וַיַּשְׁלֵ֤ךְ <WH7993> and cast עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> over בֶּ֔גֶד <WH899> a cloth כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he רָאָ֔ה <WH7200> upon him when he saw כָּל־ <WH3605> everyone הַבָּ֥א <WH935> that every one that came עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> over וְעָמָֽד׃ <WH5975> by him stood still

כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he הֹגָ֖ה <WH3014> When he was removed מִן־ <WH4480> from הַֽמְסִלָּ֑ה <WH4546> out of the highway עָבַ֤ר <WH5674> went on כָּל־ <WH3605> all אִישׁ֙ <WH376> all the people אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after יוֹאָ֔ב <WH3097> Joab לִרְדֹּ֕ף <WH7291> to pursue אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> after שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7652> Sheba בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בִּכְרִֽי׃ <WH1075> of Bichri

וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֞ר <WH5674> And he went בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all שִׁבְטֵ֣י <WH7626> through all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel אָבֵ֛לָה <WH59> unto Abel וּבֵ֥ית מַעֲכָ֖ה <WH1038> and to Bethmaachah וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַבֵּרִ֑ים <WH1276> and all the Berites ס [וַיִּקְלֵהוּ כ] (וַיִּקָּ֣הֲל֔וּ <WH7035> gather together ק) וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> and went אַף־ <WH637> and also אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <WH310> also after

וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <WH935> And they came וַיָּצֻ֣רוּ <WH6696> and besieged עָלָ֗יו <WH5921> in בְּאָבֵ֙לָה֙ <WH59> him in Abel בֵּ֣ית הַֽמַּעֲכָ֔ה <WH1038> of Bethmaachah וַיִּשְׁפְּכ֤וּ <WH8210> and they cast up סֹֽלְלָה֙ <WH5550> a bank אֶל־ <WH413> against הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> against the city וַֽתַּעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> and it stood בַּחֵ֑ל <WH2426> in the trench וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָם֙ <WH5971> and all the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who אֶת־ <WH854> were with יוֹאָ֔ב <WH3097> that [were] with Joab מַשְׁחִיתִ֖ם <WH7843> battered לְהַפִּ֥יל <WH5307> to throw it down הַחוֹמָֽה׃ <WH2346> the wall

וַתִּקְרָ֛א <WH7121> Then cried אִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> woman חֲכָמָ֖ה <WH2450> a wise מִן־ <WH4480> from הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> out of the city שִׁמְע֤וּ <WH8085> Hear שִׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> hear אִמְרוּ־ <WH559> say נָ֣א <WH4994> Please אֶל־ <WH413> about יוֹאָ֔ב <WH3097> I pray you unto Joab קְרַ֣ב <WH7126> Come near עַד־ <WH5704> against הֵ֔נָּה <WH2008> here וַאֲדַבְּרָ֖ה <WH1696> hither that I may speak אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> about

וַיִּקְרַ֣ב <WH7126> And when he was come near אֵלֶ֔יהָ <WH413> about וַתֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said הָאִשָּׁ֛ה <WH802> unto her the woman הַאַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you יוֹאָ֖ב <WH3097> Joab וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> I [am he] Then she said אָ֑נִי <WH589> I וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he answered ל֗וֹ שְׁמַע֙ <WH8085> unto him Hear דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> the words אֲמָתֶ֔ךָ <WH519> of thine handmaid וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> said שֹׁמֵ֥עַ <WH8085> I do hear אָנֹֽכִי׃ <WH595> she

וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> Then she spake לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying דַּבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> They were wont יְדַבְּר֤וּ <WH1696> to speak בָרִֽאשֹׁנָה֙ <WH7223> in old time לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying שָׁאֹ֧ל <WH7592> They shall surely יְשָׁאֲל֛וּ <WH7592> ask בְּאָבֵ֖ל <WH59> [counsel] at Abel וְכֵ֥ן <WH3651> after that הֵתַֽמּוּ׃ <WH8552> and so they ended

אָנֹכִ֕י <WH595> I שְׁלֻמֵ֖י <WH7999> I [am one of them that are] peaceable אֱמוּנֵ֣י <WH539> [and] faithful יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> in Israel אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You מְבַקֵּ֗שׁ <WH1245> thou seekest לְהָמִ֨ית <WH4191> to destroy עִ֤יר <WH5892> a city וְאֵם֙ <WH517> and a mother בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> in Israel לָ֥מָּה <WH4100> Why תְבַלַּ֖ע <WH1104> why wilt thou swallow up נַחֲלַ֥ת <WH5159> the inheritance יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Jehovah פ

וַיַּ֥עַן <WH6030> answered יוֹאָ֖ב <WH3097> And Joab וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said חָלִ֤ילָה <WH2486> Far be it חָלִ֙ילָה֙ <WH2486> far be it לִ֔י אִם־ <WH518> should אֲבַלַּ֖ע <WH1104> from me that I should swallow up וְאִם־ <WH518> or אַשְׁחִֽית׃ <WH7843> or destroy

לֹא־ <WH3808> not כֵ֣ן <WH3651> Such הַדָּבָ֗ר <WH1697> The matter כִּ֡י <WH3588> But אִישׁ֩ <WH376> [is] not so but a man מֵהַ֨ר <WH2022> of mount אֶפְרַ֜יִם <WH669> Ephraim שֶׁ֧בַע <WH7652> Sheba בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בִּכְרִ֣י <WH1075> of Bichri שְׁמ֗וֹ <WH8034> by name נָשָׂ֤א <WH5375> hath lifted up יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> his hand בַּמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> against the king בְּדָוִ֔ד <WH1732> [even] against David תְּנֽוּ־ <WH5414> deliver אֹת֣וֹ <WH853> לְבַדּ֔וֹ <WH905> Only וְאֵלְכָ֖ה <WH1980> will depart מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> from the city וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <WH802> And the woman אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹאָ֔ב <WH3097> unto Joab הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold רֹאשׁ֛וֹ <WH7218> Behold his head מֻשְׁלָ֥ךְ <WH7993> shall be thrown אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> to you בְּעַ֥ד <WH1157> to thee over הַחוֹמָֽה׃ <WH2346> the wall
